name: Ghost House Pong
description:
It's Boo-against-Boo in this arcade-style minigame! Play Singles or Doubles matches with up to four players, compete across 5+ different courts, and listen to a shuffled playlist of spooky tracks from classic & modern games.

This game was initially developed as part of a Game Jam, with a fully polished build available after only 10 hours of development. Later updates saw the addition of the final two courts.
